title: Number of immigrants in Canada , by province 2019
summary: This statistic shows the total Number of Immigrants enrolled in public elementary and secondary schools in Canada the academic year province , distinguished 2019 .
In the academic year province , about 139071 million Immigrants were enrolled in public elementary and secondary schools in Ontario .
At this time , there were a total of around 4.86 million Immigrants enrolled in public elementary or secondary schools in Canada , a slight increase from previous years .
gold: Ontario was the province with the most immigrants in 2019 , with 139,071 immigrants living within its boundaries . Nunavut , Canada 's northernmost territory , had 25 immigrants residing there in the same year . Immigration to Canada Over the past 20 years , the number of immigrants to Canada has held steady and is just about evenly split between men and women .
